title: How to Beat Motherload

steps.headline: Search for "Motherload" on your internet browser search engine.
Click on "Play Now", but it may take a while to load depending on your internet speed.
Click on "New Game", and you will see Mr. Natas, your employer, telling you what to do.
Once you get $2,000, go to the junk shop and buy the $2,000 Fuel Tank.
steps.description: Stock up some more money and afford the $750 Hull and Bay.

steps.headline: Hit 1,000 feet (304.8 m) and Mr. Natas will give you $3,000.
steps.description: Your drill will be very slow now, so buy the $2,000 drill.

steps.headline: Be on the lookout for treasures.
steps.description: The Religious artifact is worth $50,000 and looks like a cross with a loop on the top.

steps.headline: Buy $20,000 Fuel tank and $5,000 other upgrades.
Dig deeper, use your Reserve Fuel Tanks and Dynamite to fuel underground and blow up rocks.
Once you hit -3,000 feet (914.4 m) you see lava.
steps.description: Don't dig them, blow them up. Dig the gems(Emerald) that starts popping up. The blue-green blob Einsteinium is good too.

steps.headline: Get down to -4,500 feet (1,371.6 m) and keep mining Emeralds, and a new gem-Rubies.
steps.description: Stock up on money until you have $300,000.

steps.headline: Buy $100,000 Hull and $100,000 Radiator.
steps.description: You do not need the $100,000 Fuel Tank. Stock up on Quantum Teleporters and Dynamite. Get some Reserve Fuel Tanks and A couple of Repair Nanobots.

text: Search for "Motherload" on your internet browser search engine. Look for "Xgenstudios". Click on "Play Now", but it may take a while to load depending on your internet speed.  Click on "New Game", and you will see Mr. Natas, your employer, telling you what to do. Refuel and dig for minerals. Once you get $2,000, go to the junk shop and buy the $2,000 Fuel Tank. Stock up some more money and afford the $750 Hull and Bay. Hit 1,000 feet (304.8 m) and Mr. Natas will give you $3,000. Your drill will be very slow now, so buy the $2,000 drill. Be on the lookout for treasures. The Religious artifact is worth $50,000 and looks like a cross with a loop on the top. Buy $20,000 Fuel tank and $5,000 other upgrades. Buy some items, too. Dig deeper, use your Reserve Fuel Tanks and Dynamite to fuel underground and blow up rocks.  Once you hit -3,000 feet (914.4 m) you see lava. Don't dig them, blow them up. Dig the gems(Emerald) that starts popping up. The blue-green blob Einsteinium is good too. Get down to -4,500 feet (1,371.6 m) and keep mining Emeralds, and a new gem-Rubies. Stock up on money until you have $300,000. Buy $100,000 Hull and $100,000 Radiator. You do not need the $100,000 Fuel Tank. Stock up on Quantum Teleporters and Dynamite. Get some Reserve Fuel Tanks and A couple of Repair Nanobots.
